pagination.description: pagination defines the pagination in the response.

AccountsResponse.title: Accounts Response
AccountsResponse.description: AccountsResponse is the response type for the Query/Accounts RPC method.

next_key.description: next_key is the key to be passed to PageRequest.key to query the next page most efficiently. It will be empty if there are no more results.

total.description: total is total number of results available if PageRequest.count_total was set, its value is undefined otherwise

cosmos.base.query.v1beta1.PageResponse.title: Page Response
cosmos.base.query.v1beta1.PageResponse.description: PageResponse is to be embedded in gRPC response messages where the corresponding request message has used PageRequest.  message SomeResponse {          repeated Bar results = 1;          PageResponse page = 2;  }

cosmos.circuit.v1.GenesisAccountPermissi.title: Genesis Account Permissions
cosmos.circuit.v1.GenesisAccountPermissi.description: GenesisAccountPermissions is the account permissions for the circuit breaker in genesis

limit_type_urls.description: limit_type_urls is used with LEVEL_SOME_MSGS to limit the lists of Msg type URLs that the account can trip. It is an error to use limit_type_urls with a level other than LEVEL_SOME_MSGS.

cosmos.circuit.v1.Permissions.title: Permissions
cosmos.circuit.v1.Permissions.description: Permissions are the permissions that an account has to trip or reset the circuit breaker.
